statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_inventory ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT brand, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE price < 50.99;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, brand FROM product_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE brand = 'Nike' AND quantity > 0
SELECT category, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM product_inventory GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 50
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT avg(price) AS avg_price, sum(stock_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM brands WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, name FROM categories ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT id, name, country FROM brands WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, b.name AS brand_name FROM products p JOIN brands b ON p.id = b.id ORDER BY b.name ASC, p.name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GamingAccessories;
SELECT product_name, category FROM GamingAccessories ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM GamingAccessories WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, rating FROM GamingAccessories JOIN ProductReviews ON GamingAccessories.product_id = ProductReviews.product_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM GamingAccessories WHERE category = 'Keyboards' ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM GamingAccessories WHERE quantity > 0 AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, category_name FROM Manufacturers m JOIN AccessoriesCategory c ON m.manufacturer_id = c.category_id;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM GamingAccessories ga JOIN ProductReviews pr ON ga.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price, category FROM GamingAccessories GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 100;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '555%';

SELECT reviews.rating, reviews.review_text, products.product_name FROM reviews INNER JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4 AND products.category = 'Electronics';
